title: redundancy
extract: Redundancy. Redundancy occurs when an employer either decides they no longer need an employee's job to be done by anyone, or the employer becomes insolvent or bankrupt, and terminates their employment. The job itself, not the employee, becomes redundant.
extract_html: Redundancy. Redundancy occurs when an employer either decides they no longer need an employee's job to be done by anyone, or the employer becomes insolvent or bankrupt, and terminates their employment. The job itself, not the employee, becomes redundant.
